mapper.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO , pd.COLOR_CHIP from ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{value} ) A JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL pd ON A.product_no = pd.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY product_NO ORDER BY product_detail_no) AS RNUM, product_no, product_detail_no, img1, img3, CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BRAND, NAME, PRICE FROM( SELECT c.product_no product_no, d.product_detail_no product_detail_no, d.img1 img1,d.img3 img3, c.CATEGORY_ID CATEGORY_ID, c.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, c.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY_NAME, c.BRAND BRAND, c.NAME NAME, c.PRICE PRICE FROM ( SELECT a.CATEGORY_ID, a.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, a.CATEGORY_NAME, b.BRAND, b.NAME, b.PRICE, b.product_no FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORY, PRODUCT_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID = PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID AND CATEGORY.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} ) a, PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO ) c, PRODUCT_DETAIL D WHERE c.product_no = d.product_no ) ) WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY product_NO ORDER BY product_detail_no) AS RNUM, product_no, product_detail_no, img1, img3, CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BRAND, NAME, PRICE FROM( SELECT c.product_no product_no, d.product_detail_no product_detail_no, d.img1 img1,d.img3 img3, c.CATEGORY_ID CATEGORY_ID, c.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, c.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY_NAME, c.BRAND BRAND, c.NAME NAME, c.PRICE PRICE FROM ( SELECT a.CATEGORY_ID, a.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, a.CATEGORY_NAME, b.BRAND, b.NAME, b.PRICE, b.product_no FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY.PARENT_CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORY, PRODUCT_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID = PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID AND CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID LIKE '%' || #{categoryId} || '%' ) a, PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO ) c, PRODUCT_DETAIL D WHERE c.product_no = d.product_no ) ) WHERE RNUM = 1
SELECT distinct * FROM product_detail pd, product p WHERE pd.product_detail_no = #{productDetailNo} and p.product_no = #{productNo}

SELECT pd.img1, pd.img2, pd.img3, pd.color_code, pd.color_chip, pd.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO, p.name, p.price, p.content, p.brand FROM product_detail pd, product p WHERE p.product_no = pd.product_no AND pd.product_detail_no = ( SELECT with_product FROM product_detail WHERE product_detail_no = #{value} )
